Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Meet me tomorrow. The current time. C-Labs. F23-C04.', 4: '1'}
{3: "You were only masticating Vera's words, but before you knew it, you already found yourself before the lab block entrance."}
{3: 'You arrive at the designated lab. The "In Use" sign on the door is alight, a jarring sight in this barren building. You are about to enter, when someone suddenly muffles your mouth.'}
{3: 'It is Vera. Her face takes up the entirety of your vision. She pulls you inside, and you hear low conversations under the dim light of the lab.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Helpless Voice', 3: "They be clamping down on this stuff, mate. Went through many hoops for 'em."}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Tch—shut the hell up. If we get found, I'm shoving you out.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Helpless Voice', 3: "Welp. This'll be the last batch for a while to come."}
{2: 'Helpless Voice', 3: "All thanks to them council people, it's been getting harder and harder to acquire this stuff. And the price's more than doubled."}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Wow. Your bosses have so much time on their butts. They're sticking their noses into this?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "These two pieces of trash too. They're quitting just because of some lil' government restriction?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Deep Voice', 3: "Can't be helped, I guess... Give me all that you have right now."}
{2: 'Helpless Voice', 3: "There's still more inside. I'll go grab 'em."}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Chill. I've got something. They won't find me.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Duh? I can hear. Don't worry, though. I've got something. They won't find me.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera blinks at you in the dark before sliding her gaze outward. Her hands on you tighten up, and you tense up as well, as if infected by Vera.'}
{3: 'The footsteps grow, but pause around a meter before where you and Vera are hiding. You feel momentary relief from not being found out.'}
{3: "Vera's musky whisper tickles your ear. Before you even manage to register that word, you were already forcefully shoved out."}
{3: 'You crash into the smuggler. He seems to be quite taken aback and is fumbling like a drunkard. The medication vials scatter to the floor.'}
{2: 'Smuggler A', 3: "The hell?! Where'd you come from?! Wait, no! Catch this clown!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The man before you yelps hysterically. The other smuggler, finally realizing the situation, quickly aims his weapon at you.'}
{2: 'Smuggler B', 3: 'Hey, get back here you lil shit!', 4: '2'}

{3: 'You run like mad. When you finally realize that the two smugglers are no longer on your trail, you raggedly jog to a halt. Hands on your knees, you fill your lungs with gulps of air to the drumming of your heart.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "Not bad. You're pretty useful. Bringing you was the right choice.", 4: '1'}
{3: '...The same place yesterday. The same streetlamp. Same Vera.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Thanks to your valiant effort, the juice is all mine. Now we're even.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "You didn't forget about yesterday already, didn't you? Those anesthetics don't come cheap. I've even given you a discount.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera is wiggling the vial in her hands. She seems to be in a good mood.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Well, then. This is mine, so. Buh-bye. I had fun on our little date.', 4: '1'}
{3: "You fish out the medication vial from your pocket. Vera's expression turns into one of amazement."}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Okay. Guess I've underestimated you. Name a price.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'That thing on your hand. Sell it to me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "I'm not the patient sort. I'll give you another chance. Name a price, or I'm wrenching it out of your hand.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "I don't care what you think! Gimme that!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "You heard 'em, yeah? This thing's getting clamped. Doesn't hurt to stock up.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Whatever. I don't care what you think! Gimme that!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "You lil' pecker face... You are turning into bird meat right this instant! Minced, then fried in a hot pan of regrets!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "I don't care what you think! Gimme that!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera takes on an offensive stance. She will undoubtedly feel no remorse for robbing you blind.'}
{2: "I'm not giving you that.", 3: '111', 4: 'I need it myself.', 5: '111'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: '...Oh whatever. What point is it trifling with a mere human.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "And it's only one vial. Not even enough for a party. You can have it all for yourself.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'But. I guess being weird has its own charms.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'I guess I don\'t dislike the you right now. So, keep it up, "Commandant."', 4: '1'}
